name: Cosmo's Game
description:
When an exciting trip to a mysterious planet reveals an etheral being wanting to play games with you, you will have to use your time travel powers to complete all of Cosmo's games.

COSMO'S GAME is a visual novel created in Ren'Py as a personal project. I had fun with putting a lot of different mechanics into this visual novel. 

I experimented with using the rewind button and saves to act as a way to "time travel". There are multiple endings which lead to one true ending. There is a gallery to display all of the gifts collected from playing, and a journal which shows the main character's diary logs.

Game features:

  • 4 endings + 1 true ending
  • 23 gifts
  • Journal entries
  • Multiple locations
  • Rewind and Load/Save functions that impact the story

Thanks for looking at my first visual novel project!
